additions.name: Of 15.75
additions.text: Of vessel's arrival at Primorsk with manifolds' height above a sea level in ballast condition not more than 15.75 m (without listing)

additions.name: Safety Inspection
additions.text: A safety inspection will be provided in Primorsk Oil Terminal (at no charge)

additions.name: Of crew matrix
additions.text: Of crew matrix: months tour: will not exceed 6 months
